attributes.action: Stop employers using the minimum wage as a guideline
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Stop employers using the minimum wage as a guideline for pay -far to many employers are using to minimum wage to exploit workers and are getting richer in the process.Many employers are paying pennies above the minimum wage which of course is legal but morally wrong-Come on employers minimum wage is as it says A MINIMUM wage -you can pay more you know?.as things stand minimum wage does NOTHING for the working man.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
